about_the_game:
Apeiron is a hybrid real-time strategy game that combines elements of roguelike, card-battler, and god game. Players are able to 'play god' by growing their own Planets and controlling giant Avatars in battle.

Overview

In Apeiron, you’ll take the role of a godling, a newborn god summoned by High Goddess Cosmos to push back the darkness of the Mad God Chaos. Explore dungeons in our PvE mode, then head to the Arena to battle it out in PvP combat, or visit your Planet to oversee the growth of your very own world.

Master the Cards

Combat in Apeiron is real-time, fast-paced card-slinging action that combines the best of Slay the Spire and MOBA gameplay to offer a fresh new battle experience. You’ll need to master your skills, read the flow of the fight, and play your cards at just the right moment to claim victory.

Embrace the Doods

As you travel the godiverse, you’ll be joined by dood Apostles, heroic (if hungry) lil’ creatures who’ll add their unique skills to your deck. There are six different Apostle classes to play with and no two Apostles are the same: each has a random selection of skills and a randomized power rating. Hunt for the perfect Apostles and form your own divine team of doods!

It’s A Miracle!

Use elemental Miracles on your Planets to shape the world and answer the prayers of your follower doods…or punish them for their sins. Depending on what kind of role model you are, your world will become a heaven on earth…or a blasted hellscape. Whichever path you choose, you’ll unlock new skills and shapes for your Avatar for when you head back into the dungeon.

Uncover the Truth

At the heart of the godiverse lies a mystery, and it will be up to you to uncover the truth behind the war between High Goddess Cosmos and the Mad God Chaos. Meet strange and powerful gods, forge alliances, and enjoy an unforgettable story.

Doodaria Community

We have a bustling community of doody gamers and streamers in our Discord! Join us to earn weekly rewards ranging from in-game items to real life plushies and cushions.

short_description: Apeiron is a Roguelite x God Game hybrid, a revival of the classic god simulation genre popular in the early 2000s. Players are able to 'play god'- by growing their own planets and controlling giant avatars in battle.
